caption:
The good news is that we can change our attachment patterns. These are learned behaviors and ways of relating. The tricky thing is that what was once adaptive and made sense for our life circumstances might now be the very thing that blocks connection.

My few of my top book recommendations about attachment:

• Hold Me Tight by Dr. Sue Johnson
• The Power of Attachment by Dr. Diane Poole Heller
• Polysecure by Jessica Fern

[Image text in alt text on IG]

Disclaimer: Content is for informational purposes and doesn’t constitute therapy. Posts are generalized and may not fit all individuals or situations. I don’t specialize in abusive relationships, therefore my content doesn’t speak to those circumstances. Attachment theory is nuanced and dynamic and cannot be fully captured in a social media post. 

#Secure #Relationships #Partners
